name: Simplenote Doff Dark Theme
description:
Keep your eyes from over brightness!

A simple doff dark view of Simplenote application that can keep your eyes healthy and prevent them from being tired.

Try it now!
additional_info: Everytime styles changed, then the logs will be described bellow v1.01 - 26/06/2018: Core section added v1.02 - 27/06/2018: Sign in, sign up, forgot password and settings section added v1.03 - 29/06/2018: Minor updates applied v1.04 - 09/07/2018: Minor updates applied Scrollbars hidden for a compact view. But you can still scroll the contents by using mouse or hold-and-move your double finger on touchpad while you're using notebook.
